thread.title: Clem Curtis dead: Build Me Up Buttercup singer with The Foundations dies aged 76
thread.title_full: Clem Curtis dead: Build Me Up Buttercup singer with The Foundations dies aged 76

author: Paul Cockerton
title: Clem Curtis dead: Build Me Up Buttercup singer with The Foundations dies aged 76
text:
Clem Curtis of The Foundations pictured in 2015 Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Singer Clem Curtis has died aged 76 after a battle with cancer, it was announced today. 
He was a member of the Sixties soul group The Foundations, who had huge hits such as Build Me Up Buttercup. 
Clem was the lead voice on their hits Baby Now That I've Found You and Back on My Feet Again. 
* More to follow.
